sql-select.name: GetInstanceCPUUtilization4StressTest_1
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT h.[ReportId] AS [ReportId] ,h.[EventTime] AS [EventTime] ,h.[RecordTimeStamp] AS [RecordTimeStamp] ,h.[RecordRingBufferType] AS [RecordRingBufferType] ,h.[MemoryUtilization] AS [MemoryUtilization] ,h.[SystemIdle] AS [SystemIdle] ,h.[SQLProcessCPUUtilization] AS [SQLProcessCPUUtilization] ,h.[OtherProcessesCPUUtilization] AS [OtherProcessesCPUUtilization] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceCPUUtilization4StressTest_01] h ORDER BY h.[EventTime] ASC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceCPUUtilization4StressTest_2
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT h.[ReportId] AS [ReportId] ,h.[EventTime] AS [EventTime] ,h.[RecordTimeStamp] AS [RecordTimeStamp] ,h.[RecordRingBufferType] AS [RecordRingBufferType] ,h.[MemoryUtilization] AS [MemoryUtilization] ,h.[SystemIdle] AS [SystemIdle] ,h.[SQLProcessCPUUtilization] AS [SQLProcessCPUUtilization] ,h.[OtherProcessesCPUUtilization] AS [OtherProcessesCPUUtilization] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceCPUUtilization4StressTest_02] h ORDER BY h.[EventTime] ASC ;

sql-select.name: GetInstanceCPUUtilization4StressTest_3
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT h.[ReportId] AS [ReportId] ,h.[EventTime] AS [EventTime] ,h.[RecordTimeStamp] AS [RecordTimeStamp] ,h.[RecordRingBufferType] AS [RecordRingBufferType] ,h.[MemoryUtilization] AS [MemoryUtilization] ,h.[SystemIdle] AS [SystemIdle] ,h.[SQLProcessCPUUtilization] AS [SQLProcessCPUUtilization] ,h.[OtherProcessesCPUUtilization] AS [OtherProcessesCPUUtilization] FROM [hist].[h_InstanceCPUUtilization4StressTest_03] h ORDER BY h.[EventTime] ASC ;
